Package gov.nih.nlm.bioscores.core

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ArgumentIdentificationWithCoreference
    This class extends ArgumentIdentification class by specifying mechanisms to incorporate coreference resolution into compositional argument identification process.
    Configuration
    Class that provides a configuration for coreference resolution.
    CoreferenceChain
    This class represents a coreference relation.
    CoreferenceProperties
    Defines simple public static lists or key-value pairs for domain knowledge that is used for coreference resolution.
    CoreferenceResolver
    The class that contains the core functionality for coreference resolution; that is, linking of coreferential mentions to their referents.
    CoreferenceSemanticGraph
    This class extends document semantic graphs to accommodate coreference relations.
    CoreferenceSemanticItemFactory
    Class to create semantic objects specific to coreference, such as expressions and coreference chains.
    CoreferenceUtils
    Static utility methods for coreference resolution operations.
    EllipsisResolver
    A very preliminary ellipsis (or implicit argument) resolution mechanism based on consumer health questions and developed for extracting frames from such questions.
    Expression
    Represents a semantic object that corresponds to a coreferential mention, such as an anaphor or a cataphor.
    ExpressionRecognition
    This class contains static methods to identify various types of pronouns and NPs that can corefer to other entities/events in a Document.
    GenericCoreferencePipeline
    The generic pipeline that can be used for coreference resolution.
    ScoringFunction
    Each coreference resolution strategy (Strategy) is associated with a scoring function that determines the salience of a specific type of agreement between the coreferential mentions on the overall compatibility between these mentions.
    Strategy
    This class represents a coreference resolution strategy.
    SurfaceElementChain
    This class represents a textually grounded coreference chain.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    CoreferenceType
    Enumeration of coreference relation types that are handled by the system and their parameters.
    CoreferenceType.Role
    Enumeration of argument roles associated with different types of coreference.
    ExpressionType
    Enumeration of coreferential mention types that are handled by the system and their parameters.
